total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the row that contains all 1s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the pattern of 2s and 8s above and below the row of 1s in the input grid.
Q3: Swap the patterns of 2s and 8s above and below the row of 1s.
Q4: Replace the 2s with 3s and the 8s with 4s in the swapped pattern.
